title: Confessing the Embarrassing Secret
itunes:author: Guest: Rosie Makinney
itunes:summary:
If you're struggling with pornography, it can be easy to say to yourself, "I'll never tell someone." However, true healing for your marriage happens when you bring a secret into the light. John, Erin and Greg explain why confessing a porn problem is important, and what to do if you admitted you need help, but the confession didn't go well. Featuring Mrs. Rosie Makinney.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY


Receive the book "Fight For Love" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-06-23?refcd=1498902


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/confessing-the-embarrassing-secret/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/rescuing-your-marriage-from-pornography-digital-download/?refcd=1498902


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
